data.actual_result: Server isn't chosen and users seen are the ones you DMed before.
data.expected_result: Server is chosen upon joining and user list loads normally
data.short_description: Joining a server doesn't load user list properly
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a server preferably with some users - Server isn't chosen and user list isn't fully loaded. - Clicking on server icon loads the user list properly
